com.coyote.drinknomore.provider

Class DrinknomoreProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.ContentProvider
      • com.coyote.drinknomore.provider.base.DrinknomoreProviderBase
        • com.coyote.drinknomore.provider.DrinknomoreProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class DrinknomoreProvider
extends DrinknomoreProviderBase
    DrinknomoreProvider. This class is used to make a bridge between your data and your gui. Harmony has first generated this class to give you a clean access to your SQLiteAdapters but you can override any method, add URI, etc. to add another sources (REST, other android content resolver, etc.)
    See Also:
    Android's guide to content providers
